data.text: Weruru ne Jehova Nyasaye wer manyien;
Weruru ne Jehova Nyasaye, pakuru nyinge;
Nimar Jehova Nyasaye duongʼ kendo owinjore gi pak;
Nikech nyiseche duto mag ogendini gin mana gik ma dhano oloso
Duongʼ kod pak nitiere e nyime;
Pakuru Jehova Nyasaye, yaye ogendini manie piny,
Miuru Jehova Nyasaye duongʼ mowinjore gi nyinge;
Lamuru Jehova Nyasaye kaka Ngʼama Ler man-gi duongʼ mangʼongo;
Wachuru e dier ogendini niya, “Jehova Nyasaye olocho.”
Polo mondo obed moil, piny mondo obed mamor;
giniwer e nyim Jehova Nyasaye, nimar obiro,
